SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Parker University?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Parker University is arc {NIT}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Williams University?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Williams University is arc {NIT}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Parker University} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Williams University} has the largest input flow.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from NIT?
SC.A: The total flow output from NIT is {63}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 31? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {34} from {Parker University} to {Williams University}, a flow of {33} from {NIT} to {Parker University}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 27? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {24} from {Williams University} to {Parker University}, a flow of {2} from {Parker University} to {NIT}, a flow of {12} from {Williams University} to {NIT}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 18 and 31? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {24} from {Williams University} to {Parker University}, a flow of {30} from {NIT} to {Williams University}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Parker University to Williams University or from NIT to Parker University?
NC.A: The flow from {Parker University} to {Williams University} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Parker University to NIT, from Parker University to Williams University, or from Williams University to NIT?
NC.A: The flow from {Parker University} to {Williams University} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {NIT}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Parker University} and {Williams University}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Parker University, Arc Williams University, Arc NIT}.
